column2: "It's obvious what Zeno's going to end up doing--he'll be trying to save everyone he runs into, even berserk Dragonkin."
"So when that happens, I want to be able to help at least a little bit. Or I don't want to get in his way, at least."
"Wh-What? Why are you looking at me like that? Well, come on, already. Let's go!"
